name: Arkane Studios
detail: Arkane Studios SASU is a French video game developer based in Lyon, France. It was founded in 1999, and released its first game, Arx Fatalis, in 2002. Arkane Studios opened a second studio, Arkane Studios Austin, in Austin, Texas in July 2006.

works.name: Wolfenstein: Youngblood / 德军总部：新血脉
Dishonored: Death of the Outsider / 羞辱：界外魔之死
